Name: Mauro Alfonso
description:
Mauro lives in the community of San Marcos. He is 47 years old, and is characterized as an honest, hardworking and entrepreneurial man. He works as a day laborer, and he raises "semillas de naranjilla" [a tropical perennial fruit-bearing plant] and other tropical fruits.

He would like to receive financial help with which he will buy agricultural supplies and seeds, so that he can grow more naranjilla plants, in hope that the future income for his family will be greater.
